original_text: After the article has been washed, the priest is to examine it again, and if the mold has not changed its appearance, even though it has not spread, it is unclean. Burn it, no matter which side of the fabric has been spoiled.
korean_text: 그 빤 곳을 볼지니 그 색점의 빛이 변하지 아니하고 그 색점이 퍼지지 아니하였으면 부정하니 너는 그것을 불사르라 이는 거죽에 있든지 속에 있든지 악성 나병이니라

sentences.original_text: After the article has been washed
the priest is to examine it again
and if the mold has not changed its appearance
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 곰팡이가 그 외관을 바꾸지 않았다면

sentences.original_text: even though it has not spread
no matter which side of the fabric has been spoiled
